thread.title: Very good price quality balance
thread.title_full: Very good price quality balance - Review of Villa Beaumarchais, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: gerardol374
title: Very good price quality balance
text:
This is a small but cute hotel, near Le Marais neighborhood
Small rooms but well maintained, vintage decoration, good food, good service, near metro station, quiet at night, parking (a bit difficult with mid sized car)
Room Tip: Ask for a Jr Suite See more room tips
